dcterms:description: A dataset containing motion capture data of various locomotion behaviors such as walking, running, jumping, and turning, used for training reinforcement learning agents.
dcterms:title: CMU Graphics Lab Motion Capture Database

A. Kumar

dcterms:description: A collection of datasets designed for deep data-driven reinforcement learning, providing various environments and tasks for training agents.
dcterms:title: D4RL (Datasets for Deep Data-Driven Reinforcement Learning)

dcterms:creator: N. Wagener
A. Kolobov
F. V. Frujeri
R. Loynd

dcterms:description: A multi-task dataset for simulated humanoid control, providing various motion capture sequences for training and evaluating control policies.
dcterms:title: MoCapAct
